expressions.TITLE: "Update"

entry_form.name: AS_GSS_FM_updateEvalVendor
entry_form.description: The interface to update the information of an evaluation vendor from the summary page of an evaluation

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isUploadInProgress: false(),
  local!isImportInProgress: false(),
  local!pendingUploadDocIds,
  local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
  local!originalEvaluationVendor: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ri!evaluationVendor,
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!isSLGToggleOn: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
  local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM: if(
    cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE,
    rule!AS_GSS_INT_GET_OpportunityDetailsFromVM(
      solicitationPiid: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber]
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!opportunityDetails: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM),
    null,
    if(
      local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM.success,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM,
        field: "result.body",
        indexDefault: null
      ),
      null
    )
  ),
  local!isVMEnabled: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!opportunityDetails),
    false(),
    cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE
  ),
  local!defaultFactorId: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_BL_defaultFactorDocumentMapping(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: {
      ri!evaluation,
      ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationVendorMap: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_initializeEvaluationVendorForUpdate(
      isVMEnabled: local!isVMEnabled,
      evaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor,
      evaluation: ri!evaluation
    ),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!allDocsFromOpportunity,
  local!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
  local!selectedIndex,
  local!selectedRows,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    label: "Update Vendor",
    instructions: "Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*)",
    skipAutoFocus: true(),
    contents: {
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorDetailsAndDocuments(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        uploadedTemporaryDocIds: local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
        isSLGToggleOn: local!isSLGToggleOn,
        isVmEnabled: local!isVMEnabled,
        selectedVendor: local!evaluationVendorMap.currentEvaluationVendor,
        showWhen: a!isNullOrEmpty(
          local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
        ),
        totalDocsFromOpportunity: local!evaluationVendorMap.totalDocsFromOpportunity,
        isUploadInProgress: local!isUploadInProgress,
        isImportInProgress: local!isImportInProgress,
        pendingUploadDocIds: local!pendingUploadDocIds,
        allDocsFromOpportunity: local!allDocsFromOpportunity,
        selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity: local!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
        selectedIndex: local!selectedIndex,
        selectedRows: local!selectedRows,
        defaultFactorId: local!defaultFactorId
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_displayMessage(
        icon: "exclamation-triangle",
        title: "Integration Error",
        message: "Please try again later or contact your system administrator",
        showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
          local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
        )
      )
    },
    buttons: rule!AS_GSS_BTN_buttonsForUpdateVendorForm(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      buttonAction: ri!buttonAction,
      evaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor,
      originalVendorDocuments: local!originalEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents],
      documentInfo: ri!documentInfo,
      uploadedTemporaryDocIds: local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
      pendingUploadDocIds: local!pendingUploadDocIds,
      currentEvaluationVendor: local!evaluationVendorMap.currentEvaluationVendor,
      integrationFailed: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
        local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
      ),
      additionalSaves: {
        a!save(
          ri!originalEvaluationVendor,
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvalVendorRecordWithAllPriceBreakups(
            evalVendor: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendorByIdentifier(
              vendorId: local!originalEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
              fields: {
                recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents,
                recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents
              }
            ),
            executeWhen: true()
          )
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_fileUploadField
sub_interfaces.description: Generic file upload field that handles read-only logic dynamically. No temporary documents can be in ri!value if readOnly = true.

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_floatingPointField
sub_interfaces.description: Generic floating point field to handle read-only logic dynamically.

data.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: if(
      ri!noFormat,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_fixed(
        number: ri!value,
        decimals: if(
          isnull(ri!numberOfDecimals),
          10,
          ri!numberOfDecimals
        ),
        no_commas: true
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_fixed(
        number: ri!value,
        decimals: if(
          isnull(ri!numberOfDecimals),
          2,
          ri!numberOfDecimals
        ),
        no_commas: false
      )
    ) & if(isnull(ri!value), "", ri!textToAppend),
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(
    label: ri!label & ri!textToAppend,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(placeholder: ri!placeholder),
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage,
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      {
        ri!validations,
        rule!AS_CO_VD_validateFloatingPointField(value: ri!value)
      }
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_integerField

data.sail_code:
if(ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,

      )
    ),
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,

  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(placeholder: ri!placeholder),
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),

    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: a!flatten({
      ri!validations,
      rule!AS_CO_VD_numberValidation(
        value: ri!value,
        minSize: ri!minSize,

      )
    }),

    align: ri!align,

  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,
    replacementValue: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(
        ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_INP_currencyField
sub_interfaces.description: Generic currency field that shows amount in required format.

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_INP_textField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard wrapper for a!textField()

data.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose
  )
)

sub_interfaces.description: Interface that contains the buttons to upload and import vendor documents

data.sail_code:
{
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headingField"(
    text: "Documents",
    size: "SMALL",
    headingTag: "H3",
    fontWeight: "BOLD",
    marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS"
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    marginBelow: "LESS",
    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: "Upload documents and map them to at least one Evaluation factor.",
      size: "SMALL",
      color: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
        brandingKey: "GrayThree",
        useSuiteBranding: true
      )
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
    buttons: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
        label: "Upload",
        icon: "upload",
        value: true,
        saveInto: { a!save(ri!isUploadInProgress, true()) },
        size: "SMALL",
        color: "SECONDARY",
        accessibilityText: if(
          or(
            ri!isUploadInProgress = true(),
            ri!isImportInProgress = true()
          ),
          {},
          "Upload documents and map them to at least one Evaluation factor."
        ),
        disabled: or(
          ri!isUploadInProgress = true(),
          ri!isImportInProgress = true()
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
        label: "Import From Opportunity",
        icon: "file-import",
        value: true,
        saveInto: {
          a!save(
            ri!selectedVendorDocumentDataFromVM,
            rule!AS_GSS_mapDataFromVMToEvaluationDocumentRecord(
              solicitationNumber: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],
              evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
              externalVendorId: ri!externalVendorId,
              startIndex: 1,
              batchSize: 1,
              version: 1
            ).data
          ),
          a!save(ri!isImportInProgress, true())
        },
        size: "SMALL",
        color: "SECONDARY",
        disabled: or(
          ri!isUploadInProgress = true(),
          ri!isImportInProgress = true(),
          ri!noDocToImport
        ),
        showWhen: ri!showImportFromOpportunity
      )
    },
    align: "START"
  )
}

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CO_INP_dateTimeFieldCustom
sub_interfaces.description: The custom date time field with separate labels for Date and Time fields.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!userValue: local(
    a!defaultValue(value: ri!value, default: {})
  ),
  local!date: todate(local!userValue),
  local!time: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!value),
    null,
    time(
      hour(local!userValue),
      minute(local!userValue),
      second(local!userValue)
    )
  ),
  local!timeSlots: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_sortArrayDistinct(
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      array: append(
        a!flatten(
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: enumerate(24) + 1,
            expression: a!localVariables(
              local!currentHour: fv!item,
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: enumerate(60 / ri!timeIntervals) * ri!timeIntervals,
                expression: time(local!currentHour, fv!item, 00)
              )
            )
          )
        ),
        local!time
      )
    ),
    ascending: true()
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!dateLabel,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(dateTime: ri!value),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
      align: null
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
      spacing: a!defaultValue(value: ri!spacing, default: "DENSE"),
      items: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          width: "MINIMIZE",
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"(
            label: ri!dateLabel,
            labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
              label: ri!dateLabel,
              labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
              readOnly: false
            ),
            instructions: ri!instructions,
            helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
            value: local!date,
            saveInto: {
              a!save(
                ri!value,
                if(
                  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: save!value),
                  {},
                  gmt(
                    datetime(
                      year(save!value),
                      month(save!value),
                      day(save!value),
                      hour(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      ),
                      minute(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      ),
                      second(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      )
                    )
                  )
                )
              ),
              ri!additionalSaves
            },
            showWhen: ri!showWhen,
            required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
            /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
            requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
              label: ri!dateLabel,
              requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
            ),
            readOnly: ri!readOnly,
            disabled: ri!disabled,
            validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
            validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
            accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          width: "MINIMIZE",
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
            label: ri!timeLabel,
            labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
              label: ri!timeLabel,
              labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
              readOnly: false
            ),
            instructions: ri!instructions,
            helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
            placeholder: ri!timePlaceholder,
            choiceLabels: local!timeSlots,
            choiceValues: local!timeSlots,
            value: local!time,
            saveInto: {
              a!save(
                ri!value,
                if(
                  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: save!value),
                  {},
                  gmt(
                    datetime(
                      year(local!userValue),
                      month(local!userValue),
                      day(local!userValue),
                      hour(save!value),
                      minute(save!value),
                      second(save!value)
                    )
                  )
                )
              ),
              ri!additionalSaves
            },
            showWhen: ri!showWhen,
            required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
            /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
            requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
              label: ri!timeLabel,
              requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
            ),
            disabled: or(
              ri!disabled,
              a!isNullOrEmpty(value: local!date)
            ),
            validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
            validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
            accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
          )
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorDetailsAndDocuments
sub_interfaces.description: The interface for the second page contents of the Add vendor form.

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
  contents: a!localVariables(
    local!noDocToImport: a!refreshVariable(
      value: ri!totalDocsFromOpportunity = length(
        {
          rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
            records: ri!selectedVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents],
            field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId,
            values: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_VM
          )
        }
      ),
      refreshOnReferencedVarChange: true()
    ),
    {
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_displayVendorInformation(
        selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor,
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        isSLGToggleOn: ri!isSLGToggleOn
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorInformation(
        selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor,
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        showWhen: true()
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_uploadOrImportVendorDocuments(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors,
        selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor,
        pendingUploadDocIds: ri!pendingUploadDocIds,
        uploadedTemporaryDocIds: ri!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
        isVmEnabled: ri!isVmEnabled,
        allDocsFromOpportunity: ri!allDocsFromOpportunity,
        selectedDocsForImportFromOpportunity: ri!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
        selectedIndex: ri!selectedIndex,
        selectedRows: ri!selectedRows,
        noDocToImport: local!noDocToImport,
        isUploadInProgress: ri!isUploadInProgress,
        isImportInProgress: ri!isImportInProgress,
        defaultFactorId: ri!defaultFactorId
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorPriceBreakup(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        selectedVendor: ri!selectedVendor
      )
    }
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen
)

sub_interfaces.description: Generic interface for displaying rich text fields

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

data.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set.

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_filterRecords
expression_rules.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GSS_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GSS_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

inputs.name: records
inputs.description: A list of record objects to filter.

inputs.name: field
inputs.description: Either a single field or multiple fields to filter against. If a single field is passed, the "value" parameter can be a list where any choice is considered a match. If multiple fields are passed, the "value" parameter should be the same length, and each value would be used for the corresponding field at the same position in the input array.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: Either a single value or list of values to filter against. See the "field" parameter for more information on how to properly use this input.

inputs.name: fieldValuePairs
inputs.description: A map array of field-value pairs to use for filtering. Note, this parameter should only be used in place of the "field" and "value" parameters (only pass this if those are both empty). This allows for more complicated filtering against multiple fields and multiple values of varying array lengths. For example, {a!map(field: Case.fields.status, value: "Open"), a!map(field: Case.fields.priority, value: {"High", "Medium"})}.

inputs.name: filterType
inputs.description: Determines the filter result of the records. Valid values: "FILTER" (default), "REJECT", "FIRST_MATCH", "FIRST_REJECT", "MATCH_COUNT", "REJECT_COUNT", "MATCH_INDICES", "REJECT_INDICES", "FULL_RESULT".

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UTIL_processDocumentName
expression_rules.description: Rule to extract document name and extension from files uploaded

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!hasNoExtension: search(".", ri!docName) = 0,
  local!namePart: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    ri!docName,
    regexsearch(
      pattern: ".*(?=\.)",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  local!extension: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    "",
    regexsearch(
      pattern: "[^\.]*$",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  a!map(
    nameWithExtension: concat(local!namePart, ".", local!extension),
    name: local!namePart,
    extension: local!extension
  )
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!hasNoExtension: search(".", ri!docName) = 0,
  local!namePart: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    ri!docName,
    regexsearch(
      pattern: ".*(?=\.)",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  local!extension: if(
    local!hasNoExtension,
    "",
    regexsearch(
      pattern: "[^\.]*$",
      searchString: ri!docName,
      regexFlags: "i"
    )[1].match
  ),
  a!map(
    nameWithExtension: concat(local!namePart, ".", local!extension),
    name: local!namePart,
    extension: local!extension
  )
)

  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
  ),
  {},
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
    value: a!map(

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle
expression_rules.description: Retrieves and then displays a single label from a bundle file -- This is meant to be used in places where you cannot utilize local variables, such as record and site page names

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(

    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey
    ),

    local!i18nData: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
      bundleFolder: ri!bundleFolder,
      bundleNames: local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName,
      localeAgnostic: ri!localeAgnostic
    ),

    rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(

    ),

  ),
  {},
  a!flatten(
    rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
      recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,

              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,

                          recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
                            nullableValue: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
                            replacementValue: true()
                          )
                        )
                      )
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            )
          ),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.priceBreakup: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.priceBreakup],
            expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD,

              data: fv!item
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence
expression_rules.description: Concatenates a list into a sentence with a configurable final separator, and/or

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
expression_rules.description: Captures metadata of a CDT if it or any of its children were updated, doing the same for all of its complex MULTIPLE children recursively.  Ideally, we should update this to work for all children.

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!totalDocsFromOpportunity: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(
      ri!latestEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents]
    ),
    0,
    length(
      ri!latestEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents]
    )
  ),
  local!latestProposalVesrion: max(
    index(
      ri!latestEvaluationVendor,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents.version,
      0
    )
  ),
  local!latestProposalDocuments: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
    records: ri!latestEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents],
    field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.version,
    values: local!latestProposalVesrion
  ),
  a!map(
    integrationError: ri!integrationError,
    totalDocsFromOpportunity: local!totalDocsFromOpportunity,
    currentEvaluationVendor: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
      records: ri!latestEvaluationVendor,
      modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId: ri!existingEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate: ri!existingEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status: ri!existingEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalPrice: ri!existingEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalPrice],
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.pricingNotes: ri!existingEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.pricingNotes],
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isUpdateRequired: false(),
        recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents: if(
          ri!existingEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isUpdateRequired] = true(),
          append(
            ri!existingEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents],
            local!latestProposalDocuments

      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the value is null, CDT with all null fields, an empty string, string with only spaces, list of null values or an empty list. Otherwise returns false.

data.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios,

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)
